name: Light the way (itch) (ka6an, Melih Murat Peşmen, onurakkiris)
name_original: Light the way (itch) (ka6an, Melih Murat Peşmen, onurakkiris)
description:
"Light the way" is a 2.5 d platform game. While one of the players is trying to illuminate the road using a torch, the other is trying to defeat the enemies they encounter by using his sword. In order to complete the path and not be left in the dark, they need to act together in harmony. Players can change their items. In order to complete their journey, they must defeat the enemies that stand in their way and overcome the obstacles. They have to overcome the thorny paths, broken stones, obstacle paths and rocks. While doing this, they have to act together in some sections and solve puzzles.

How to play:

Both users have to play on the same device.
